mapper.select: select '${year}新保' as cbfs,cls,zxcls,hccls,bzxcls,(cls-hccls) as whccls,convert(zxcls/cls*100,decimal(10,2)) as zxzb,convert(zxcls/cls*100,decimal(10,2)) as zxzb,convert(hccls/cls*100,decimal(10,2)) as hczb,convert(bzxcls/cls*100,decimal(10,2)) as bzxzb,convert((cls-hccls)*100/cls,decimal(10,2)) as whczb from (select ( select count(distinct cjh) from ${year}xbsj ) as cls, ( select count(distinct cjh) from ${year}xbsj a inner join ${year}shsj b on a.cjh = b.vin where b.wxsrll > 0 ) as zxcls, ( select count(distinct cjh) from ${year}xbsj a inner join ${year}shsj b on a.cjh = b.vin ) as hccls, ( select count(distinct cjh) from ${year}xbsj a inner join ${year}shsj b on a.cjh = b.vin where b.wxsrll = 0 ) as bzxcls ) t

select '${year}续保' as cbfs,cls,zxcls,hccls,bzxcls,(cls-hccls) as whccls,convert(zxcls/cls*100,decimal(10,2)) as zxzb,convert(hccls/cls*100,decimal(10,2)) as hczb,convert(bzxcls/cls*100,decimal(10,2)) as bzxzb,convert(zxcls/cls*100,decimal(10,2)) as zxzb,convert((cls-hccls)/cls*100,decimal(10,2)) as whczb from (select ( select count(distinct cjh) from ${year}rbsj ) as cls, ( select count(distinct cjh) from ${year}rbsj a inner join ${year}shsj b on a.cjh = b.vin where b.wxsrll > 0 ) as zxcls, ( select count(distinct cjh) from ${year}rbsj a inner join ${year}shsj b on a.cjh = b.vin ) as hccls, ( select count(distinct cjh) from ${year}rbsj a inner join ${year}shsj b on a.cjh = b.vin where b.wxsrll = 0 ) as bzxcls ) t
mapper.sql: select vin,jssj,max(wxsrll) as wxsrll from ${year}shsj group by vin,DATE_FORMAT(jssj, '%Y-%m-%d')
select cjh,zbsj from ${year-1}xbsj union ALL select cjh,zbsj from ${year}xbsj union ALL select cjh,zbsj from ${year-1}rbsj union ALL select cjh,zbsj from ${year}rbsj
mapper.select: select sum(wxsrll) as jscz from ${year}shsj

select count(distinct cjh) as snjp from ( select cjh from ${year-1}xbsj where qdrq >=DATE_ADD(#{dateFrom},INTERVAL -1 YEAR) and qdrq <=DATE_ADD(#{dateTo},INTERVAL -1 YEAR) union ALL select cjh from ${year-1}rbsj where chudanrq >=DATE_ADD(#{dateFrom},INTERVAL -1 YEAR) and chudanrq <=DATE_ADD(#{dateTo},INTERVAL -1 YEAR) union all select vin as cjh from ${year-1}shsj where DATE_FORMAT(jssj, '%Y-%m-%d') >=DATE_ADD(#{dateFrom},INTERVAL -1 YEAR) and DATE_FORMAT(jssj, '%Y-%m-%d') <=DATE_ADD(#{dateTo},INTERVAL -1 YEAR) ) t
select sum(zfy) as zbf from ${year}rbsj where chudanrq >= #{dateFrom} and chudanrq <= #{dateTo}
select sum(zfy) as bf from ${year}rbsj where chudanrq >= #{dateFrom} and chudanrq <= #{dateTo} and cjh in (select cjh from ${year-1}xbsj)
select sum(zfy) as bf from ${year}rbsj where chudanrq >= #{dateFrom} and chudanrq <= #{dateTo} and cjh in (select cjh from ${year-1}rbsj)
select sum(zfy) as bf from ${year}rbsj where chudanrq >= #{dateFrom} and chudanrq <= #{dateTo} and cjh not in (select cjh from ${year-1}xbsj) and cjh not in (select cjh from ${year-1}rbsj)

select count(distinct cjh) as bncj from ${year}rbsj where chudanrq >= #{dateFrom} and chudanrq <= #{dateTo} and cjh in ( select cjh from ( select cjh from #{year-1}xbsj union ALL select cjh from #{year-1}rbsj ) t1 ) and cjh in ( select vin from #{year-1}shsj )

select sum(zfy) as bf from ${year}rbsj where chudanrq >= #{dateFrom} and chudanrq <= #{dateTo} and cjh in ( select cjh from ( select cjh from #{year-1}xbsj union ALL select cjh from #{year-1}rbsj ) t1 ) and cjh in ( select vin from #{year-1}shsj )

select count(distinct cjh) as bncj from ${year}rbsj where chudanrq >= #{dateFrom} and chudanrq <= #{dateTo} and cjh not in ( select cjh from ( select cjh from #{year-1}xbsj union ALL select cjh from #{year-1}rbsj ) t1 ) and cjh in ( select vin from #{year-1}shsj )

select sum(zfy) as bf from ${year}rbsj where chudanrq >= #{dateFrom} and chudanrq <= #{dateTo} and cjh not in ( select cjh from ( select cjh from #{year-1}xbsj union ALL select cjh from #{year-1}rbsj ) t1 ) and cjh in ( select vin from #{year-1}shsj )

select count(distinct cjh) as bncj from ${year}rbsj where chudanrq >= #{dateFrom} and chudanrq <= #{dateTo} and cjh in ( select cjh from ( select cjh from #{year-1}xbsj union ALL select cjh from #{year-1}rbsj ) t1 ) and cjh not in ( select vin from #{year-1}shsj )

select sum(zfy) as bf from ${year}rbsj where chudanrq >= #{dateFrom} and chudanrq <= #{dateTo} and cjh in ( select cjh from ( select cjh from #{year-1}xbsj union ALL select cjh from #{year-1}rbsj ) t1 ) and cjh not in ( select vin from #{year-1}shsj )

select count(distinct cjh) as bncj from ${year}rbsj where chudanrq >= #{dateFrom} and chudanrq <= #{dateTo} and cjh not in ( select cjh from ( select cjh from #{year-1}xbsj union ALL select cjh from #{year-1}rbsj ) t1 ) and cjh not in ( select vin from #{year-1}shsj )

select sum(zfy) as bf from ${year}rbsj where chudanrq >= #{dateFrom} and chudanrq <= #{dateTo} and cjh not in ( select cjh from ( select cjh from #{year-1}xbsj union ALL select cjh from #{year-1}rbsj ) t1 ) and cjh not in ( select vin from #{year-1}shsj )
